wadagath pawulaka ipida anunta udaw karamin dahamiwa jiwath wana me pudgalaya bandhanagara riye sita adhikarana shalawa wetha gena yana ayuru dutu wasantha gana danna handunana keneku niladharingen awasara gena usawi sira madiriya wetha gos wasanthagen “me mokada” yi wimasiya.wasantha ketiyen karanaya pahadili kota thamanta nithignya sahaya laba ganimata pawa awasthawak nolabunu bawa pawasimen ee hithawatha nithignya mahathakuge sahaya laba janneya.edina polisiya sidu kale adhikaranayata sakakaruwan idiripath kirima pamanak bawin nithignyawaraya karunu kiwa da nadu wibhagaya desathiyakata kal damunu bawin me dedena nawathath dina daha hatharak rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karini.yalith bandhanagara gatha wi dewani dinaye bandhanagaraye bhawana upadeshaka am. ee. as. jayawardhana mahatha meheya wu aagamika wada satahanata sahabhagi wimata wasanthata awasthawa labini.eya awasanaye ohu jayawardhana mahatha samanga thamanta siduwu awanaduwa sampurnayen ma wisthara kota pawasa edina bhawana wada satahanen pasu thaman ge manasata wishala sahanayak, suwayak danunu bawath ithuru dina dahathuna thula sampurnayen ma eeta kapa wi aadhyathmiya diyunuwak labannata adhishtana kala bawath pawasiya.wasantha randi siti bandhanagara wattuwe randawiyan desiya gananak pamana wuha.
